venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
So with Laconia bike week still looming in NH, and my brother-in-law unavailable it made sense to look elsewhere for our two-wheeled adventures. A ride I have been meaning to do for sometime is Rt 44 west in CT to Rt 22 north in NY. We will meet Stephen at the Hess in Newton, jump on the pike and meet up with Jim & Joe at the rest stops on the way. I think we will have KSU at each rest stop (starting with Westborough) on the hour, so.. Westborough: 9AM, Charlton: 10AM. From there, 84 or 91 South to Hartford and 44 west to NY state. Westborough is just past 495 on the pike, westbound & Charlton is just before 84 South, westbound. Total miles for the day, 329 (6 hours in the saddle) ~ 3-4 hours for stops and exploring makes for a 10-12 hour day, pretty typical for a 300 mile tour.

Route: http://goo.gl/maps/L3dE
item.name: Tri-state Ramble
